<script type="text/javascript">
  var cancelarRefresh;
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
  };
  
  var OT_DELAY = 180000;
  REFRESH_TIMEOUT = null;

  function iniciarRefresh() {
      REFRESH_TIMEOUT = setTimeout(function () {
          window.location.reload();
      }, OT_DELAY);
  }
  iniciarRefresh();
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
    clearTimeout(REFRESH_TIMEOUT);
    console && console.log && console.log("Refresh cancelado");
  };

  $(window).scroll(function(){
      cancelarRefresh();
      iniciarRefresh();
  });

  
</script>

    _gaq.push(['_setLocalRemoteServerMode']);
    _gaq.push(['_trackPageview',title]);
    _gaq.push(["_setCustomVar", 1, "Secao", editoria, 1]);
    _gaq.push(["_setCustomVar", 2, "isArticle", "false", 1]);
    setTimeout("_gaq.push(['_trackevent', '15_seconds', 'read'])", 15000);

    (function() {
        var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = 'true';
        ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
        var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
    })();

    var trackPV = function(track){
        track = unescape( decodeURIComponent( track.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"") ) );
        _gaq.push(['_trackPageview',track]);
    }

</script>
<!-- Fim Google Analytics -->

    ;(function(p,l,o,w,i,n,g){if(!p[i]){p.GlobalIvcNamespace=p.GlobalIvcNamespace||[];
        p.GlobalIvcNamespace.push(i);p[i]=function(){(p[i].q=p[i].q||[]).push(arguments)
        };p[i].q=p[i].q||[];n=l.createElement(o);g=l.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];n.async=1;

        idWeb: '33'
    });

<script>

	var menuOffset = 300;
	$(document).on("scroll", function(){
	       var docScroll = $(document).scrollTop();
	       if(docScroll >= menuOffset) { 
	           $("#floating-bar").addClass("fixed");
			   $("#floating-bar").slideDown(300);
	           //dynamically change the width of floating bar according to it's width of previous state 
	       }else {
			   $("#floating-bar").slideUp(300,function(){
				   $("#floating-bar").removeClass("fixed");
			   });
	       }
	});


</script>

	Div Flutuante Login:

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-forgotten" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<form method="post" onsubmit="return false;" id="floatForgottenPasswordForm">
				<div class="twelve column top">
					<div class="six column title">
						Recuperar Senha
					</div>
					<div class="six column">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" id="close-forgotten">	
					</div>
				</div>
				<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
				<div class="twelve column form-login">
					<div class="twelve column input">
						<p>Digite o Email de seu cadastro:</p>
						<input type="text" name="reset_loginname" id="input-name" />
					</div>

				</div>	
				<div class="twelve column form-more">
					<div class="six column input">
					</div>
					<div class="six column input">
						<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
					</div>
				</div> 
				<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
			</form>
		</div>	
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		reset_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	reset_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	}
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.resetPassword(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatForgottenPasswordForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>

					</a>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		login_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            },
	            login_password:{
	            	required:true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	login_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	},
            	 login_password:{
 	            	required:"O campo senha é obrigatório"
 	            }
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.login(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatLoginForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>

    <div class="cf slot-item  ">
        






<div class="twelve columns top"><h5>Veja os filmes em cartaz</h5></div>
<div class="twelve columns busca-assunto" data-elemento="cinema-filtror">
    <div class="twelve columns info">
        <div class="twelve columns">
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left"">
                    <select id="PorFilme">
                        <option value="">-- Filmes --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <select id="PorGenero">
                        <option value="">-- Gêneros --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left">
                    <select id="PorCinema">
                        <option value="">-- Cinemas --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <input id="PalavraChave" placeholder="Palavra-chave" type="text" value="">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="twelve columns buscar-filme">
                <button id="BuscaFilme" class="btn">Buscar</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function abreFiltro() {
        var id = $(this).attr("id");
        var value = $(this).val();

        window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?" + id + "=" + value;
    }

    $("#BuscaFilme").click(function () {
        var valor = $("#PalavraChave").val();
        if (valor) {
            window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?busca=" + valor;
        }

        return false;
    });


    var $SELECTS = [$("#PorFilme"), $("#PorGenero"), $("#PorCinema")];

    var json = {"CinemaFiltros":{"PorFilme":{"Registro":[{"ID":"2864","Valor":"A Bela e a Fera"},{"ID":"2876","Valor":"A Grande Muralha"},{"ID":"2860","Valor":"Cinquenta Tons Mais Escuros"},{"ID":"2903","Valor":"Era o Hotel Cambridge"},{"ID":"2900","Valor":"Fragmentado"},{"ID":"2895","Valor":"Hiroshima, Meu Amor"},{"ID":"2890","Valor":"Insubstitu\u00edvel"},{"ID":"2875","Valor":"Internet - O Filme"},{"ID":"2888","Valor":"Kong: A Ilha da Caveira"},{"ID":"2865","Valor":"Lego Batman - O Filme"},{"ID":"2873","Valor":"Lion - Uma Jornada para Casa"},{"ID":"2878","Valor":"Logan"},{"ID":"2881","Valor":"Moonlight: Sob a Luz do Luar"},{"ID":"2897","Valor":"O Filho de Joseph"},{"ID":"2896","Valor":"Pedro Osmar, Pra Liberdade Que Se Conquista"},{"ID":"2902","Valor":"Power Rangers"},{"ID":"2901","Valor":"T2 Trainspotting"},{"ID":"2827","Valor":"Tinha que Ser Ele? (*)"}]},"PorGenero":{"Registro":[{"ID":"1","Valor":"A\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"2","Valor":"Anima\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Aventura"},{"ID":"4","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia Dram\u00e1tica"},{"ID":"6","Valor":"Document\u00e1rio"},{"ID":"7","Valor":"Drama"},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Drama \/ Romance"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Fantasia"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Suspense"}]},"PorCinema":{"Registro":[{"ID":"14","Valor":"Belas"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Betim "},{"ID":"2","Valor":"BH Shopping (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Big"},{"ID":"681","Valor":"Boulevard"},{"ID":"299","Valor":"Cidade"},{"ID":"686","Valor":"Contagem"},{"ID":"10","Valor":"Del Rey"},{"ID":"11","Valor":"Diamond Mall (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"683","Valor":"Esta\u00e7\u00e3o BH"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Ita\u00fa Power Shopping"},{"ID":"12","Valor":"Minas Shopping"},{"ID":"688","Valor":"Monte Carmo "},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Norte"},{"ID":"15","Valor":"Pampulha Mall"},{"ID":"18","Valor":"Paragem"},{"ID":"687","Valor":"Partage Shopping Betim"},{"ID":"8","Valor":"P\u00e1tio Savassi (Cinemark)"},{"ID":"21","Valor":"Ponteio"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Via Shopping"}]}}};
    var cf = json.CinemaFiltros;

    for (var i in $SELECTS) {
        var $select = $SELECTS[i];
        $select.on("change", abreFiltro);
        var id = $select.attr("id");

        var dados = cf[id].Registro;

        for (var j in dados) {
            var item = dados[j];

            var $option = $("<option value='" + item.ID + "'>" + item.Valor + "</option>")

            $select.append($option);
        }
    }

    $("#PorFilme").val("");
    $("#PorGenero").val("");
    $("#PorCinema").val("");


</script>

    </div>

            if (false && window.Polopoly && Polopoly.preview && !$("body").hasClass('super-noticia')) {
              Polopoly.preview.initialize();
              Polopoly.preview.initPageManager();
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.initialize(Polopoly.Localization.Toolbar);

			var gads = document.createElement('script');
			gads.async = true;

<script>
  function fixMenuOnScroll() {
      var menu = $('#menu');
      var geral = $('#geral');
      var offSetMenu = 118;
      $(window).scroll(function () {
          var offSetWindow = $(window).scrollTop();
          if (offSetWindow >= offSetMenu) {
              menu.addClass('menu-fixed');
              geral.addClass('geral-absolute');
          } else {
              menu.removeClass('menu-fixed');
              geral.removeClass('geral-absolute');
          }
      });
  }
  
  fixMenuOnScroll();
  
  var calculatadeMenu = false;

  function larguraSubmenus() {
      var aba, paddingR, totalAba, container, retorno;
      $('#menu li.sub').each(function () {
          aba = $(this).find('.aba').width();
          paddingR = $(this).find('.aba').css('padding-right').replace('px', '');
          totalAba = aba + parseInt(paddingR);
          container = $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').width();
          retorno = container - totalAba;
          if ($(this).hasClass('last')) {
              if (($(this).position().left + $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').width()) > 988) {
                  $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').css('left', function () {
                      return '-' + retorno + 'px'
                  });
              }
          }
      });
      calculatadeMenu = true;
  }
  $('#buscar').focus(function () {
      $('#buscaGoogle').addClass('getFocus');
  });
  $('#buscar').blur(function () {
      $('#buscaGoogle').removeClass('getFocus');
  });
  $('#menu h2 a').hover(function () {
      if (!calculatadeMenu) {
          larguraSubmenus();
      }
      $(this).closest('li').find('.menuContainer').css({
          visibility: "visible"
      }).animate({
          opacity: 1
      }, 50, function () {});
  }, function () {
      openedMenu = setTimeout(function (obj) {
          $('.menuContainer').animate({
              opacity: 0
          }, 50, function () {
              $(this).css({
                  visibility: "hidden"
              })
          })
      }, 300);
  });
  $('#menu .menuContainer').hover(function () {
      $(this).closest('li').find('.menuContainer').css({
          visibility: "visible",
          opacity: 1
      });
      clearInterval(openedMenu);
  }, function () {
      $(this).animate({
          opacity: 0
      }, 50, function () {
          $(this).css({
              visibility: "hidden"
          })
      })
  });
</script>
        <div id="destaques">

	<dl>

	    	    	<li><h4><span>&bull;</span><a title="Filmes Grátis" target="_self" href="http://ig.crackle.com.br">Filmes Grátis</a></h4></li>
	    	    	<li><h4><span>&bull;</span><a title="Jovem Nerd" target="_self" href="http://tvig.ig.com.br/busca.html?categoria=&q=jovem%20nerd&buscar=Buscar&type=maisrecente">Jovem Nerd</a></h4></li>

	    </dd>
	</dl>
    </nav>

      <!-- INICIO BARRA LATERAL -->
<script>
	function formatarTempo(d, id){
	seconds = Math.floor(d / 1000);
	minutes = Math.floor(seconds / 60);
	timeTemp = minutes * 60;
	seconds = seconds - timeTemp;
	if(minutes < 10){
	minutes = "0"+minutes;
	}
	if(seconds < 10){
	seconds = "0"+seconds;
	}
	tempoFinal = minutes +':'+ seconds;
	jQuery("#estampaTempo_"+ id).html(tempoFinal);
	}
	function montaEstrelas(numeroDeEstrelas, id, className){
	dif = 5 - numeroDeEstrelas;
	for(i=1; i <= numeroDeEstrelas; i++ ){
	jQuery(className+" #estrela_"+ id).append("<span class=\"bgEstrela ico_estrela_cheia\">estrela</span>");
	}
	if (dif != 0){
	for(i=1; i <= dif; i++){
	jQuery(className+" #estrela_"+ id).append("<span class=\"bgEstrela ico_estrela_vazia\">estrela</span>");
	}
	}
	}
	function validaHD(resolucao, id, url, className){
	if(resolucao == "HD"){
	jQuery(className +' #altres_'+ id +'').append('<a href="/'+ url +'?hd=1" class="hd"></a>');
	}
	}

	function appendHtml(docs, item, className) {
	url=item.url_tvig;
	urlFinal=url.split('/');
	if (item.title.length > 40){
	_titulo=item.title;
	numCrop=_titulo.lastIndexOf(" ", 35)
	_titulo=_titulo.substring(_titulo, numCrop)+'...';
	}else{
	_titulo=item.title;
	}
	html='';
	html='<li>\
	<div class="imagem">\
	<a title="'+ item.title +'" href="/'+ item.url_tvig +'">\
	<img width="148" height="83" alt="'+ item.title +'" src="'+ item.url_thumbnails[1] +'"/>\
	</a>\
	<a class="play" id="estampaTempo_'+ item.id +'" href="/'+ item.url_tvig +'"></a>\
	</div>\
	<div class="descricao">\
	<h5><a title="'+ item.name_categories[0] +'" href="/'+ urlFinal[0] +'/">'+ item.name_categories[0] +'</a></h5>\
	<h4><a title="'+ item.title +'" href="/'+ item.url_tvig +'">'+ _titulo +'</a></h4>\
	<strong>'+ item.number_of_views +'</strong><span>exibições</span>\
	<div id="altres_'+ item.id +'"></div>\
	<div id="estrela_'+ item.id +'" class="estrela"></div>\
	</div>\
	</li>';

	jQuery(className).append(html);
	montaEstrelas(item.ratings, item.id, className);
	formatarTempo(item.duration, item.id);
	validaHD(item.file_outputs[1], item.id, item.url_tvig, className);
	}

	function maisrecente(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisrecente');
	});
	}
	/*function maisvotado(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvotado');
	});
	}*/

	//maisVistos - Hoje-semana-mes-sempre
	function maisvisto(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvisto');
	});
	}
	function maisvisto_hoje(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvisto_hoje');
	});
	}
	function maisvisto_semana(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvisto_semana');
	});
	}
	function maisvisto_mes(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvisto_mes');
	});
	}
	function maisvisto_sempre(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvisto_sempre');
	});
	}
	//maisVistos - Hoje-semana-mes-sempre
	//maisvotado - Hoje-semana-mes-sempre
	function maisvotado(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvotado');
	});
	}
	function maisvotado_hoje(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvotado_hoje');
	});
	}
	function maisvotado_semana(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvotado_semana');
	});
	}
	function maisvotado_mes(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvotado_mes');
	});
	}
	function maisvotado_sempre(data) {
	jQuery.each(data.response.docs, function(docs, item) {
	appendHtml(docs, item, '#maisvotado_sempre');
	});
	}
	//maisvotado - Hoje-semana-mes-sempre
</script>

	<style>
	/* CSS ABAS */
	ul.abas-filtro{float:left;margin-bottom:20px;width:317px;border-bottom:1px solid #eee}

	ul.abas-filtro li a{float:left;display:block;margin:0 4px 1px 0;padding:9px 10px 0;height:22px;font:bold 14px Arial;color:#999;background:#f8f8f8}
	ul.abas-filtro li a.ativo{position:relative;margin-bottom:-1px;border:1px solid #eee;border-bottom:1px solid #fff;color:#333;background:#FFF}
	ul.abas-filtro li:last-child a{margin-right:0}

<script>
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisrecente&size=3&jsonp=maisrecente",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback:'maisrecente'});
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisvotado&size=3&filterByDate=last-24hours&jsonp=maisvotado_hoje",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback:'maisvotado_hoje'});
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisvotado&size=3&filterByDate=last-week&jsonp=maisvotado_semana",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback:'maisvotado_semana'});
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisvotado&size=3&filterByDate=last-month&jsonp=maisvotado_mes",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback:'maisvotado_mes'});
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisvotado&size=3&jsonp=maisvotado_sempre",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback:'maisvotado_sempre'});
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisvisto&size=3&filterByDate=last-24hours&jsonp=maisvisto_hoje",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback :'maisvisto_hoje'});
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisvisto&size=3&filterByDate=last-week&jsonp=maisvisto_semana",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback :'maisvisto_semana'});
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisvisto&size=3&filterByDate=last-month&jsonp=maisvisto_mes",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback :'maisvisto_mes'});
	jQuery.ajax({type:"GET",url:"//tvig.ig.com.br/_search/?sort=maisvisto&size=3&jsonp=maisvisto_sempre",dataType:'jsonp',jsonpCallback:'maisvisto_sempre'});
	jQuery('#maisrecente_div').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_div').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_hoje').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_div').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_hoje').css("display","block");
</script>

<script>
	function maisVistosAbas(param){
	if(param=='maisvisto_hoje'){
	jQuery('#hoje').addClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#semana').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mes').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#sempre').removeClass("ativo");

	jQuery('#maisvisto_hoje').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_semana').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_mes').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_sempre').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisVistoUrl').attr('href', '/tudo/?type=maisvisto&filterByDate=last-24hours');
	jQuery('#maisVistoUrl').html('Ver todos de hoje');
	}else if(param=='maisvisto_semana'){
	jQuery('#hoje').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#semana').addClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mes').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#sempre').removeClass("ativo");

	jQuery('#maisvisto_hoje').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_semana').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_mes').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_sempre').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisVistoUrl').attr('href', '/tudo/?type=maisvisto&filterByDate=last-week');
	jQuery('#maisVistoUrl').html('Ver todos da semana');
	}else if(param=='maisvisto_mes'){
	jQuery('#hoje').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#semana').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mes').addClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#sempre').removeClass("ativo");

	jQuery('#maisvisto_hoje').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_semana').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_mes').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_sempre').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisVistoUrl').attr('href', '/tudo/?type=maisvisto&filterByDate=last-month');
	jQuery('#maisVistoUrl').html('Ver todos do mês');
	}else if(param=='maisvisto_sempre'){
	jQuery('#hoje').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#semana').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mes').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#sempre').addClass("ativo");

	jQuery('#maisvisto_hoje').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_semana').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_mes').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvisto_sempre').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisVistoUrl').attr('href', '/tudo/?type=maisvisto&filterByDate=maisvisto_sempre');
	jQuery('#maisVistoUrl').html('Ver todos');
	}
	}
	function maisVotadosAbas(param){
	if(param=='maisvotado_hoje'){
	jQuery('#mvhoje').addClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvsemana').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvmes').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvsempre').removeClass("ativo");

	jQuery('#maisvotado_hoje').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_semana').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_mes').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_sempre').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisVotadoUrl').attr('href', '/tudo/?type=maisvotado&filterByDate=last-24hours');
	jQuery('#maisVotadoUrl').html('Ver todos de hoje');
	}else if(param=='maisvotado_semana'){
	jQuery('#mvhoje').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvsemana').addClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvmes').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvsempre').removeClass("ativo");

	jQuery('#maisvotado_hoje').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_semana').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_mes').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_sempre').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisVotadoUrl').attr('href', '/tudo/?type=maisvotado&filterByDate=last-week');
	jQuery('#maisVotadoUrl').html('Ver todos da semana');
	}else if(param=='maisvotado_mes'){
	jQuery('#mvhoje').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvsemana').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvmes').addClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvsempre').removeClass("ativo");

	jQuery('#maisvotado_hoje').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_semana').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_mes').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_sempre').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisVotadoUrl').attr('href', '/tudo/?type=maisvotado&filterByDate=last-month');
	jQuery('#maisVotadoUrl').html('Ver todos do mês');
	}else if(param=='maisvotado_sempre'){
	jQuery('#mvhoje').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvsemana').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvmes').removeClass("ativo");
	jQuery('#mvsempre').addClass("ativo");

	jQuery('#maisvotado_hoje').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_semana').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_mes').css("display","none");
	jQuery('#maisvotado_sempre').css("display","block");
	jQuery('#maisVotadoUrl').attr('href', '/tudo/?type=maisvotado&filterByDate=maisvotado_sempre');
	jQuery('#maisVotadoUrl').html('Ver todos');
	}
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
if(document.getElementById("flashcontent")){
  var so = new SWFObject('//i0.statig.com.br/tvig/images/textoHeader.swf', "mymovie", "200", "40", "8", "#FFFFFF");
  so.addVariable("titulo", document.getElementById("flashcontent").innerHTML);
  so.addVariable("linha", '404040');
  so.addVariable("texto", '6a6a6a');
  so.addParam("wmode", "transparent");
  so.addParam("quality", "high");
  so.addParam("salign", "LT");
  so.addParam("scale", "noscale");
  so.write("flashcontent");
}


function resizeFlash(w) {
  w = w * 105/100;
  var elem = document.getElementById("flashcontent");
  elem.style.width=w+"px";
  elem.childNodes[0].style.width=w+"px";
  elem.style.height="40px";
  elem.childNodes[0].style.height="40px";
  controlaOferecimento = 1;
}
</script>

b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="ig-ad">
        <div class="publicidade superbanner">  <div id="ad_leaderboard"></div></div>
      </div>
    </header>

			<ul>
	<li class="underscore">Cidades mais acessadas</li>
					<li><a href="http://www.tempoagora.com.br/previsao-do-tempo/sp/SaoPaulo/">São Paulo</a></li>

	</ul>		</div>

<!-- Criteo StickyBanner 25/02/2015 -->
<style media="screen" type="text/css">
#ctoclose{display:block;width:9px;height:10px;background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,);background-repeat:no-repeat!important;border-bottom-color:#6d6c71;cursor:pointer}#ctoclosebg{padding:7px;cursor:pointer;float:right}#ctowrapper{position:fixed;opacity:0;line-height:0!important;z-index:2147483646!important;text-align:center!important;zoom:1}.ctounselectable{-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;-o-user-select:none;user-select:none}#ctopanel{display:inline-block;width:100%}#ctoclose:hover{opacity:.7}#ctobannerwrapper{display:inline-block!important;position:relative!important;vertical-align:middle}#ctomessage{display:none;background-color:#fff;border-style: solid;border-width: 1px 0 0 0;cursor:pointer;line-height: 21px;padding:0px 20px;font-size:12px;font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;float:right;}</style><div id="ctowrapper"><div id="ctopanel"><span class="ctounselectable" id="ctomessage"></span><div id="ctoclosebg"><a id="ctoclose" class="ctounselectable close"></a></div></div><div id="ctoinnerwrapper"><div id="ctobannerwrapper" class="ctounselectable">
<script type="text/javascript">

/*-------------------------Criteo StickyBanner options-------------------------*/
var zoneid_desktop = "227701";
var zoneid_mobile  = "227702";

// The limit values are used to detect a mobile.
// This script will use the mobile zone id if the user's window width is inferior to "limit_width px" or if the user's windows height is inferior "limit_height px". Otherwise, it will use the desktop zone id.
var limit_width  = 700;
var limit_height = 200;

// Overlay color and opacity
var overlay_color = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.09)";

// Closing area
var close_message = "Fechar";
var closing_color = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)";

// Animation
var animationTime = 300;


/*-------------------------Criteo StickyBanner code-------------------------*/

<h6 data-text="R&aacute;dio Vagalume.FM">R&aacute;dio Vagalume.FM</h6>
<a href="https://vagalume.fm/" target="_blank">Todas as esta&ccedil;&otilde;es &raquo;</a>
<ul>
<li>
<a href="https://vagalume.fm/vagalume-vibe/" target=_blank>
<img src="https://s1.vagalume.com/images/vagalumefm/stations/vagalume-vibe.png" alt="Vagalume Vibe">
</a>
</li>

	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {

			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}

                    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_eventos">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://www.atletas.info';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="http://www.atletas.info/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>
                          <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_su-foto">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://www.atletas.info';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[encontre_sua_foto]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_sua-foto short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="http://www.atletas.info/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">

                  <div class="topo_ferramentas" style="background:;"><h2>Más Visitados</h2></div>
	<div id="maislidos" class="carousel slide" data-ride="carousel">
		<div class="titulomaislidos" style="background:<?php echo $cor_section; ?>;"><?php _e("MAIS ACESSADOS", "ativo"); ?></div>
		<ol class="carousel-indicators">
			<li data-target="#maislidos" data-slide-to="0" class="active"></li>
			<li data-target="#maislidos" data-slide-to="1" class=""></li>
			<li data-target="#maislidos" data-slide-to="2" class=""></li>
		</ol>
		<div class="carousel-inner"><div class="item active" style="background-image: url(http://do1pouckcwxot.cloudfront.net/argentina/uploads/2017/01/02160032/amor.jpg);">

				<div class="container">
					<div class="carousel-caption">
						<div class="col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">

      <script>

// Define a posicao inicial do mouse
var mouse_position_switch = false;

// Evento que vai detectar o movimento do mouse
jQuery(document.body).on('mouseleave', function(e) {
    // Evento que dispara quando o mouse for ao topo
    if(mouse_position_switch && retornaCookie('modalcadastrado') == null && retornaCookie('modalexibida') == null ){
      jQuery('#modal-abandono').modal('show');
      // Seta o cookie que a modal foi exibida e assim nao exibira mais // qtd em dias
      setaCookie('modalexibida', '365');
    }
  });

// Funcoes de manipulacao de cookies
function setaCookie(key, value, url) {
  var expires = new Date();
  expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (value * 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
  document.cookie = key + '=' + value +';path=/'+ ';expires=' + expires.toUTCString();
}

function retornaCookie(key) {
  var keyValue = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + key + '=([^;]*)(;|$)');
  return keyValue ? keyValue[2] : null;
}

// Evento que seta o valor booleano para o mouse e mostra entao a modal do abandono
jQuery(document.body).on('mousemove', function(e) {
  if(e.clientY < 100){
    mouse_position_switch = true;
  } else {
    mouse_position_switch = false;
  }
});

jQuery("#enviar-popup").on('click', function() {
  jQuery("#cadastro-popup").submit()
});

// Eventos do formulario
jQuery('#cadastro-popup').validate({
  rules: {
    nome: { required: true, minlength: 2 },
    email: { required: true, email: true },
  },
  showErrors: function() {
    if (this.settings.highlight) {
      for (var i = 0; this.errorList[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.highlight.call(this, this.errorList[i].element,
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
    if (this.settings.unhighlight) {
      for (var i = 0, elements = this.validElements(); elements[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.unhighlight.call(this, elements[i],
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
  },                     
  submitHandler: function( form ){

    var cidadecad = 'Argentina';
    var cidadegeo = localStorage.getItem("cidade");
    if(cidadecad==""){
      var cidgrava = cidadegeo;
    }else{
      var cidgrava = cidadecad;
    }
    jQuery.ajax({
      type: "POST",
      url: "http://www.atletas.info/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=salvanewsletter",
      data: {
        idorigem: '42',
        nome: jQuery('#nome-popup').val(),
        email: jQuery('#email-popup').val(),
        cidade: cidgrava,
        etapa: 'Abandono'
      },
      success: function(data, textStatus, xhr) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#enviado-popup').fadeIn('fast');
          setaCookie('modalcadastrado', '365'); //define cookie para que o cadastro seja lido posteriormente a fim de nao exibir a modal / 365 dias
        });
      },
      error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#falha-popup').fadeIn('fast');
        });
      }
    });
    return false;
  }
});




</script>
		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='http://www.atletas.info/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
		</script>

	if (document.cookie.indexOf(disableStr + '=true') > -1) {
		window[disableStr] = true;
	}
	function gaOptout() {
		document.cookie = disableStr + '=true; expires=Thu, 31 Dec 2099 23:59:59 UTC; path=/';

jQuery(function($){
	var twitterSlider = function(){
		$('#topbar .last-tweets ul').addClass('slides');
		$('#topbar .last-tweets').flexslider({
			animation: "fade",
			slideshowSpeed: 5 * 1000,
			animationDuration: 700,
			directionNav: false,
			controlNav: false,
			keyboardNav: false
		});
	};
	$('#topbar .last-tweets > div').bind('tweetable_loaded', function(){
		twitterSlider();
	});
});

		<div class=""><div class="widget_shopping_cart_content">
					<ul class="cart_list product_list_widget">
					   <li class="empty">Nenhum produto no carrinho.</li>
					</ul>
				  </div></div>			</div><!-- .cart_wrapper -->

			<script type="text/javascript">
			jQuery(document).ready(function($){
				$(document).on('click', '.cart_control', function(e){
					//e.preventDefault();
				});

				$(document).on('hover', '.cart_control', function(){
					$(this).next('.cart_wrapper').slideDown();
				}).on('mouseleave', '.cart_control', function(){
					$(this).next('.cart_wrapper').delay(500).slideUp();
				});


			    $(document).on('mouseenter', '.cart_wrapper', function(){ $(this).stop(true,true).show() });
                $(document).on('mouseleave', '.cart_wrapper', function(){ $(this).delay(500).slideUp() });
			});
			</script>

	<p>Com o Porta-Medalhas seu orgulho pela disputa de mais uma prova ficará exposto em grande estilo. Além de ser prático, possui design esportivo e material de alta durabilidade. O Porta Medalhas é resistente, fácil de instalar e com excelente acabamento em pintura eletrostática.</p>
<p><strong>Tamanho: </strong>largura 30cm &#8211; altura 5,5cm</p>
<p><strong>Informações Gerais: </strong>Não precisa furar a parede, o produto já acompanha fita dupla face. Suporta aproximadamente 50 medalhas e possui 15 ganchos.</p>

		<div class="description">
		<div itemprop="description" class="product-description">
	<p>Estilo, versatilidade e conforto são algumas das características marcantes da <strong>Camiseta Amo Corrida</strong>.</p>
<p>Confeccionada com tecnologia exclusiva, a camiseta é ideal para caminhadas, corridas e especialmente para o lazer e ao ritmo agitado do dia a dia. Não deixe de conferir!</p>
<p>Principais Características</p>
<ul>
<li>Composição: Confeccionada em 100% poliamida</li>
<li>Estilo: Casual</li>
<li>Tipo: Mangas curtas</li>
<li>Gola: Careca (redonda)</li>
<li>Peso Aproximado: 110 g (varia de acordo com o tamanho)</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Medidas:</strong><br />
Baby Look : 59 x 38 x 44 *<br />
P : 64 x 41 x 48 *<br />
M : 66 x 44 x 50 *<br />
G : 68 x 47 x 52 *<br />
GG : 70 x 50 x 54 *<br />
* elas representam as medidas de comprimento x largura costa x largura torax, respectivamente.</p>

		<div class="description">
		<div itemprop="description" class="product-description">
	<p>A Jaqueta Circuito das Estações foi criada para que seja possível praticar atividades físicas independente da condição climática. Possui toque suave com a pele, e deixa seus movimentos mais livres.</p>
<p><strong>Medidas:</strong><br />
Peito x Comprimento<br />
<strong>BL</strong>     49 x 61 cm<br />
<strong>P  </strong>      51 x 69 cm<br />
<strong>M</strong>       53 x 71 cm<br />
<strong>G  </strong>      55 x 73 cm<br />
<strong>GG  </strong>   57 x 75 cm</p>
<p><strong>Composição</strong></p>
<p>92% poliester e 8% elastano</p>

	<p style="margin-bottom: 18.0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Georgia, serif; color: #ff0000;">Bicicleta Circuito Pedalar 2016</span></strong></p>
<p style="margin: 0cm; margin-bottom: .0001pt; font-stretch: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: start; widows: 1; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; word-spacing: 0px;"><span style="font-family: &#039;Georgia&#039;,&#039;serif&#039;; color: #444444;">Quadro dobrável em aço fundido</span></p>

<p style="margin: 0cm; margin-bottom: .0001pt; font-stretch: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: start; widows: 1; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; word-spacing: 0px;"><span style="font-family: &#039;Georgia&#039;,&#039;serif&#039;; color: #444444;">Suporta 110kg</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0cm; margin-bottom: .0001pt; font-stretch: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: start; widows: 1; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; word-spacing: 0px;"><span style="font-family: &#039;Georgia&#039;,&#039;serif&#039;; color: #444444;">Freio dianteiro V-break</span></p>

		<div class="description">
		<div itemprop="description" class="product-description">
	<p><span style="font-style: italic; color: #747373;">Ideal para corridas noturnas, a camiseta manga longa Night Run</span><span style="font-style: italic; color: #747373;"> combina visual diferenciado e moderno com conforto. Confeccionada em Poliamida, proporciona sensação de leveza e conforto com excelente caimento.</span></p>
<p><strong>Medidas:</strong></p>
<p>Baby Look : 59 x 38 x 44 *<br />
P : 64 x 41 x 48 *<br />
M : 66 x 44 x 50 *<br />
G : 68 x 47 x 52 *</p>
<p>* elas representam as medidas de comprimento x largura costa x largura torax, respectivamente.</p>

	<p>Estilo, versatilidade e conforto são algumas das características marcantes da <strong>Camiseta Amo Corrida</strong>.</p>

<li>Composição: Confeccionada em 100% poliamida</li>

P : 64 x 41 x 48 *<br />
M : 66 x 44 x 50 *<br />
G : 68 x 47 x 52 *<br />
GG : 70 x 50 x 54 *<br />
* elas representam as medidas de comprimento x largura costa x largura torax, respectivamente.</p>

		<div class="description">
		<div itemprop="description" class="product-description">
	<p><span style="font-style: italic; color: #333333;">A Jaqueta </span><span style="font-style: italic; color: #333333;">Circuito das Estações</span><span style="font-style: italic; color: #333333;"> foi criada para que seja possível praticar atividades físicas independente da condição climática. Possui toque suave com a pele, e deixa seus movimentos mais livres.</p>
<p><strong>As medidas a seguir são:comprimento x costa x peito, respectivamente.</strong><br />
P- 70 x 45,5 x 112<br />
M- 72 x 48 x 116<br />
G  74 x 49,5 x 120<br />
GG- 76 x 51 x 124<br />
</span></p>
<p><strong>Na compra de 1 (uma) Jaqueta Estações Inverno 2014, GANHE 1(um) cinto de hidratação com 1 squeeze!</strong></p>
<p>*Promoção válida enquanto durarem os estoques.</p>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
jQuery(function($){
	var carouFredSel;
	var carouFredSelOptions = {
		responsive: false,
		auto: true,
		items: 4,
		circular: true,
		infinite: true,
		debug: false,
        prev: '.section-portfolio-slider .prev',
        next: '.section-portfolio-slider .next',
        swipe: {
          	onTouch: false
        },
        scroll : {
            items     : 1,
            pauseOnHover: true
        } 
	};


/*
	$('.products_tabs').imagesLoaded(function(){
		$('.products:first', $(this)).each(function(){

	   		var prev = $(this).find('.es-nav-prev');
	   		var next = $(this).find('.es-nav-next');
	
	   		carouFredSelOptions.prev = prev;
	   		carouFredSelOptions.next = next;

			carouFredSel = $(this).carouFredSel(carouFredSelOptions);
		});
		
    });
*/

	$('.panel', $('.products_tabs')).on('yit_tabopened', function(){
		
		var t = $(this);
   		var prev = $(this).find('.es-nav-prev');
   		var next = $(this).find('.es-nav-next');

   		carouFredSelOptions.prev = prev;
   		carouFredSelOptions.next = next;
		
		if( $('body').outerWidth() <= 767 ) {
			t.find('li').each(function(){
				$(this).width( t.width() );
			});
						
			carouFredSelOptions.items = 1;
		} else {
			t.find('li').each(function(){
				$(this).attr('style', '');
			});
						
			carouFredSelOptions.items = 4;
		}
		
		carouFredSel = $(this).find('.products').carouFredSel(carouFredSelOptions);
	});
	
    $('.panel', $('.products_tabs')).on('yit_tabclosed', function(){
    	//carouFredSel.trigger('destroy', false).attr('style','');
    });
    
    // create slider when page is loaded
    $('.panel', $('.products_tabs')).imagesLoaded(function(){
        $(window).trigger('resize');    
    });

    $(window).resize(function(){
    	var t = carouFredSel.parents('.panel');
    	carouFredSel.trigger('destroy', false).attr('style','');
    	
		if( $('body').outerWidth() <= 767 ) {
			t.find('li').each(function(){
				$(this).width( t.width() );
			});
							
			carouFredSelOptions.items = 1;
		} else {
			t.find('li').each(function(){
				$(this).attr('style', '');
			});
						
			carouFredSelOptions.items = 4;
		}
    	
    	carouFredSel.carouFredSel(carouFredSelOptions);
    	$('.es-nav-prev, .es-nav-next').removeClass('hidden').show();
    });
    
    $(document).on('feature_tab_opened', function(){
        $(window).trigger('resize');
        $('.es-nav-prev, .es-nav-next').removeClass('hidden').show();
    });
                                                      

/*
	$('.products_tabs').each(function(){
		$('.border-box > div.panel', $(this)).on('yit_tabopened', function(){
			$(this).find('.products-slider-wrapper').elastislide( elastislide_defaults );
		});
		$('.border-box > div.panel', $(this)).on('yit_tabclosed', function(){
			$(this).find('.products-slider-wrapper').elastislide( 'destroy' );
		});
	});
*/
});
</script>

toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="ig-ad">
        <div class="publicidade superbanner">  <div id="ad_leaderboard"></div></div>
      </div>
    </header>

toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+"         <div class="container-chamadas-policia">
          <div class="titulo-secao-policia">Polícia</div>
          <div class="chamada-grande-policia-wrapper">

/*-------------------------Criteo StickyBanner options-------------------------*/
var zoneid_desktop = "212424";
var zoneid_mobile  = "212425";

// The limit values are used to detect a mobile.
// This script will use the mobile zone id if the user's window width is inferior to "limit_width px" or if the user's windows height is inferior "limit_height px". Otherwise, it will use the desktop zone id.
var limit_width  = 960;
var limit_height = 200;

// Overlay color and opacity
var overlay_color = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.09)";

// Closing area
var close_message = "Fechar";
var closing_color = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)";

// Animation
var animationTime = 300;




/*-------------------------Criteo StickyBanner code-------------------------*/
var zoneid_selected = zoneid_desktop;
if( window.innerWidth<window.limit_width || window.innerHeight<window.limit_height) {
	zoneid_selected = zoneid_mobile;
}

0.955)"),t.style.setProperty("-moz-transition","all "+window.animationTime+"ms cubic-bezier(0.455, 0.030, 0.515, 0.955)"),t.style.setProperty("-o-transition","all "+window.animationTime+"ms 0.955)"),t.style.setProperty("-webkit-transition-timing-function","cubic-bezier(0.455, 0.030, 0.515, 0.955)"),t.style.setProperty("-webkit-transition-timing-function","cubic-bezier(0.455, 0.030, 0.515, 0.955)"),t.style.setProperty("-moz-transition-timing-function","cubic-bezier(0.455, 0.030, 0.515, 0.955)"),t.style.setProperty("-o-transition-timing-function","cubic-bezier(0.455, 0.030, 0.515, 0.955)"),t.style.setProperty("transition-timing-function","cubic-bezier(0.455, 0.030, 0.515, 0.955)")}function removeInOutAnimation(t){t.style.setProperty("-webkit-transition",""),t.style.setProperty("-moz-transition",""),t.style.setProperty("-o-transition",""),t.style.setProperty("transition",""),t.style.setProperty("-webkit-transition-timing-function",""),t.style.setProperty("-webkit-transition-timing-function",""),t.style.setProperty("-moz-transition-timing-function",""),t.style.setProperty("-o-transition-timing-function",""),t.style.setProperty("transition-timing-function","")}function ctoClose(){var t=document.getElementById("ctowrapper");t.style.opacity=0,setTimeout(function(){t.style.display="none"},window.animationTime+100)}function ctoInitialize(){var t=document.getElementById("ctobannerwrapper");if(t.clientHeight>0){var e=document.getElementById("ctowrapper"),i=document.getElementById("ctoinnerwrapper");if(""!=window.close_message){var n=document.getElementById("ctomessage");n.style.display="block",n.style.color=window.closing_color,n.style.borderColor=window.closing_color,n.innerHTML=window.close_message}i.style.cssText="background:"+window.overlay_color+";",e.style.cssText="bottom:0;left:0;right:0;";var o=document.getElementById("ctoclosebg");o.style.cssText="background-color: "+window.closing_color+";",o.onclick=function(){ctoClose()},document.getElementById("ctomessage").onclick=function(){ctoClose()},setInOutAnimation(e),e.style.opacity=1,setTimeout(function(){removeInOutAnimation(e)},window.animationTime)}}ctoInitialize();</script>                 $j(".links img:first").css('opacity','0.3');
                $j(".links img").click(function () {
                    $j(".links img").css('opacity','1.0');
                    var link = $j(this).attr("id");
                    $j(this).css('opacity','0.3');

                    $j(".video_prin").html(
                      "<video poster=\"http://videosonline.cptec.inpe.br/~rvonline/filmes/flv/" + link + ".jpg\" width=\"390\" height=\"306\" title=\"" + $j(this).attr("title") + "\" controls=\"controls\" preload=\"preload\">"+
                    	"<source src=\"http://videosonline.cptec.inpe.br/~rvonline/filmes/webm/" + link + ".webm\" type='video/webm; codecs=\"vp8.0, vorbis\"'>"+

                      "<source src=\"http://videosonline.cptec.inpe.br/~rvonline/filmes/ogv/" + link + ".ogv\" type='video/ogg; codecs=\"theora, vorbis\"'>"+
                      "<p>Video não está visível</p></video>");

/* contagem de visualizacoes do video */

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
    addEventVideo();
    addEventClick();
});

function addEventVideo() {
    var video = document.getElementsByTagName('video')[0];
    video.addEventListener("play", function(e) {
        _gaq.push(["_trackEvent","Video iniciado: " + ((video.getAttribute('title') != null)?video.getAttribute('title'):"Previsao Diaria"), e.type, video.currentSrc]);
    }, false);
    video.addEventListener("ended", function(e) {
        _gaq.push(["_trackEvent","Video finalizado: " + ((video.getAttribute('title') !== null)?video.getAttribute('title'):"Previsao Diaria"), e.type, video.currentSrc]);
    }, false);
}

function addEventClick() {
    var linkNoticia = document.getElementsByClassName('ver-noticia')[0];
    var btnFechar = document.getElementsByClassName('fechar')[0];
    linkNoticia.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
        _gaq.push(["_trackEvent","Link da noticia clicado: " + linkNoticia.getAttribute('href'), e.type, linkNoticia.getAttribute('href')]);
    }, false);
    btnFechar.addEventListener("ended", function(e) {
        _gaq.push(["_trackEvent","Banner fechado", e.type, "Banner aviso modelos fechado"]);
    }, false);
}

//script cartão de natal

	function fecharPopUp() {
		document.getElementById("banner-aviso").style.display = "none";
		var d = new Date();
		d.setTime(d.getTime() + (12*60*60*1000));
		var expires = "expires="+d.toUTCString();
		document.cookie = "ja_viu=true; " + expires + "; path=/";
	}

        function abrirPopUp() {
		document.getElementById("banner-aviso").style.display = "block";
                cont = 0;
                document.cookie = "ja_viu=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC";
	}

	window.setInterval(function() {
		var cook = document.cookie;

		if(cook.indexOf("ja_viu") == -1)
			cont++;

		if(cont == 18)
			document.getElementById("banner-aviso").style.display = "none";
	}, 1000);

//fim script cartão de natal

function MM_swapImgRestore() { //v3.0
  var i,x,a=document.MM_sr; for(i=0;a&&i<a.length&&(x=a[i])&&x.oSrc;i++) x.src=x.oSrc;
}

function MM_preloadImages() { //v3.0
  var d=document; if(d.images){ if(!d.MM_p) d.MM_p=new Array();
    var i,j=d.MM_p.length,a=MM_preloadImages.arguments; for(i=0; i<a.length; i++)
    if (a[i].indexOf("#")!=0){ d.MM_p[j]=new Image; d.MM_p[j++].src=a[i];}}
}

function MM_findObj(n, d) { //v4.01
  var p,i,x;  if(!d) d=document; if((p=n.indexOf("?"))>0&&parent.frames.length) {
    d=parent.frames[n.substring(p+1)].document; n=n.substring(0,p);}
  if(!(x=d[n])&&d.all) x=d.all[n]; for (i=0;!x&&i<d.forms.length;i++) x=d.forms[i][n];
  for(i=0;!x&&d.layers&&i<d.layers.length;i++) x=MM_findObj(n,d.layers[i].document);
  if(!x && d.getElementById) x=d.getElementById(n); return x;
}

function MM_jumpMenu(targ,selObj,restore){ //v3.0
  eval(targ+".location='"+selObj.options[selObj.selectedIndex].value+"'");
  if (restore) selObj.selectedIndex=0;
}

function MM_swapImage() { //v3.0
  var i,j=0,x,a=MM_swapImage.arguments; document.MM_sr=new Array; for(i=0;i<(a.length-2);i+=3)
   if ((x=MM_findObj(a[i]))!=null){document.MM_sr[j++]=x; if(!x.oSrc) x.oSrc=x.src; x.src=a[i+2];}
}

<script>
function fechar(){
$j("#reuniaoClimatica").hide();
}

var DataSaida = new Date("02/23/2017 20:00:00");
var DataHoje = new Date();

if(DataHoje < DataSaida){

console.log("fica");
setTimeout(fechar, 15000);
}else{
console.log("sai");
$j("#reuniaoClimatica").hide();
}
</script>

droptexto[0]="<div class='f1'>Agenda 2016</div><br />Agenda de cursos e eventos para 2016";
droptexto[1]="<div class='f1'>Workshop</div><br />Aerosol-Cloud-Precipitation";
////NO need to edit beyond here/////////////

var preloadedimages=new Array()
for (p=0;p<dropimages.length;p++){
preloadedimages[p]=new Image()
preloadedimages[p].src=dropimages[p]
}

var ie4=document.all
var dom=document.getElementById

if (ie4||dom)
document.write('<div style="position:relative;width:'+slideshow_width+';height:'+slideshow_height+';overflow:hidden"><div id="canvas0" style="position:absolute;width:'+slideshow_width+';height:'+slideshow_height+';background-color:'+slidebgcolor+';left:-'+slideshow_width+'"></div><div id="canvas1" style="position:absolute;width:'+slideshow_width+';height:'+slideshow_height+';background-color:'+slidebgcolor+';left:-'+slideshow_width+'"></div></div>')
else
document.write('<a href="javascript:rotatelink()"><img name="defaultslide" src="'+dropimages[0]+'" border="0" alt="'+droptexto[0]+'" /></a>"'+droptexto[0])

var curpos=parseInt(slideshow_width)*(-1)
var degree=10
var curcanvas="canvas0"
var curimageindex=linkindex=0
var nextimageindex=1


function movepic(){
if (curpos<0){
curpos=Math.min(curpos+degree,0)
tempobj.style.left=curpos+"px"
}
else{

clearInterval(dropslide)
nextcanvas=(curcanvas=="canvas0")? "canvas0" : "canvas1"
tempobj=ie4? eval("document.all."+nextcanvas) : document.getElementById(nextcanvas)
var slideimage='<img src="'+dropimages[curimageindex]+'" border="0" alt="CPTEC" />'
//alert(slideimage);
tempobj.innerHTML=(droplinks[curimageindex]!="")? '<a href="'+droplinks[curimageindex]+'">'+slideimage+'</a>' : slideimage
nextimageindex=(nextimageindex<dropimages.length-1)? nextimageindex+1 : 0
setTimeout("rotateimage()",pause)
}
}

function rotateimage(){
if (ie4||dom){
resetit(curcanvas)
var crossobj=tempobj=ie4? eval("document.all."+curcanvas) : document.getElementById(curcanvas)
crossobj.style.zIndex++
var temp='setInterval("movepic()",10)'
dropslide=eval(temp)
curcanvas=(curcanvas=="canvas0")? "canvas1" : "canvas0"
}
else
document.images.defaultslide.src=dropimages[curimageindex]
document.getElementById('teste').innerHTML=droptexto[curimageindex]
linkindex=curimageindex
curimageindex=(curimageindex<dropimages.length-1)? curimageindex+1 : 0
}

function rotatelink(){
if (droplinks[linkindex]!="")
window.location=droplinks[linkindex]
}

function resetit(what){
curpos=parseInt(slideshow_width)*(-1)
var crossobj=ie4? eval("document.all."+what) : document.getElementById(what)
crossobj.style.left=curpos+"px"
}

function startit(){
var crossobj=ie4? eval("document.all."+curcanvas) : document.getElementById(curcanvas)
crossobj.innerHTML='<a href="'+droplinks[curimageindex]+'"><img src="'+dropimages[curimageindex]+'" border="0" alt="CPTEC" /></a>'
rotateimage()
}
if (ie4||dom)
window.onload=startit
else
setInterval("rotateimage()",pause)

//]]>
</script>
	
  <div id="teste"></div>
   </div>-->
    <div class="edu2">
	<ul>

<div class="st" valign="top" width="130"><a href="http://clima1.cptec.inpe.br/estacoes/pt" target="_parent">Primavera<br><img src="/~rwww1/common/img/ic_primavera.gif" border="0" width="56" height="60" title=Primavera></a><br>22/Set<br>17h02</div>

class="PageLayout-content"><article class="Content" id="main-content"><div class="region region-content"><div class="SystemBlock" ><div id="Node--942" class="  Node node node-corporate-page  clearfix Boulder, Chicago, Cincinnati, Detroit, Los Angeles, Miami, New York, Seattle, Sunnyvale, Washington, D.C.</p><p><strong>International offices</strong><br />Amsterdam, Bangalore, Berlin, Bogota, Brussels, Cologne, Dubai, Dublin, Hamburg, Hong Kong, Jakarta, London, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Milan, Mumbai, New Delhi, Osaka, Paris, Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, Singapore, Sydney, Seoul, Tokyo, Toronto, Vancouver</p></div></div><p> </p><p>  </p><h5><strong>LEADERSHIP</strong> / EXECUTIVE TEAM + BOARD OF DIRECTORS</h5><div class="Grid"><div class="Grid-cell u-size1of4 u-sm-sizeFull u-md-size1of2"><p><a href="https://about.twitter.com/company/press/leadership"><strong>EXECUTIVE TEAM</strong></a></p><p><a href="/company/press/leadership#Jack_Dorsey" title="Jack Dorsey"><strong>Jack Dorsey</strong></a><br />CEO</p><p><a href="/company/press/leadership#Anthony_Noto" title="Anthony Noto"><strong>Anthony Noto</strong></a><br />COO &amp; CFO</p><p><a href="/company/press/leadership#Vijaya_Gadde"><strong>Vijaya Gadde</strong></a><br />General Counsel</p></div><div class="Grid-cell u-size1of4 u-sm-sizeFull u-md-size1of2"><p> </p><p><a href="/company/press/leadership#Leslie_Berland" title="Leslie Berland"><strong>Leslie Berland</strong></a><br />CMO</p><p><a href="/company/press/leadership#Robert_Kaiden" title="Robert Kaiden"><strong>Robert Kaiden</strong></a><br />CAO</p></div><div class="Grid-cell u-size2of4 u-sm-sizeFull u-md-size1of2"><p><a href="https://investor.twitterinc.com/directors.cfm"><strong>BOARD OF DIRECTORS</strong></a></p><p><strong>Omid Kordestani</strong><br />Executive Chairman</p><p><strong>Jack Dorsey</strong><br />CEO, Twitter; CEO, Square</p><p><strong>Peter Fenton</strong><br />General Partner, Benchmark Capital</p><p><strong>Hugh Johnston</strong><br />Vice Chairman and CFO, PepsiCo, Inc.</p><p><strong>Martha Lane Fox</strong><br />Founder and Chairperson, doteveryone.org.uk; Chairperson, MakieLab; Crossbench Peer in House of Lords</p><p><strong>Debra L. Lee</strong><br />Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, BET Networks</p><p><strong>David Rosenblatt</strong><br />CEO, 1stdibs.com, Inc.</p><p><strong>Marjorie Scardino</strong><br />Chairman, MacArthur Foundation</p><p><strong>Bret Taylor</strong><br />CEO and Co-founder, Quip</p><p><strong>Evan Williams</strong><br />CEO, Medium; CEO, Obvious Corp.</p></div><p></p><hr /><p></p><p class="align-center"><br />See what&#8217;s happening in the world right now.</p><p class="align-center"> <a href="https://twitter.com?utm_source=gazebo&amp;utm_medium=button&amp;utm_term=bottom&amp;utm_content=joinnow&amp;utm_campaign=evergreen&amp;ref_src=twsrc%3Agazebo%7Ctwcamp%3Aevergreen%7Ctwgr%3Abutton%7Ctwterm%3Abottom%7Ctwcon%3Ajoinnow" class="Button Button--primary btn btn-primary is-inversed">JOIN NOW</a> </p><p class="align-center"></p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article></div></div></div></section><footer class="Footer  is-narrow Footer--secondary"><div class="Footer-wrap"></div></footer><footer class="Footer Footer--global">

<script>

$(window).load(function() {
        startRotator("#rotator");
			$("#featured").tabs({fx:{opacity: "toggle"}}).tabs("rotate", 5000, true);
      })
		
		$(function(){   
			var nav = $('#topo');   
			$(window).scroll(function () { 
				if ($(this).scrollTop() > 10) { 
					$('#topo').hide('alow');
					$('#topomini').show('alow');
				
				} else {
					$('#topomini').hide('alow');
					$('#topo').show('alow');
					 
				} 
			});  
		});
		
function atu_calendario(xmes, xano){
	var vmes = xmes;
	var vano = xano;
	var par  = 'month=' + vmes + '&year=' + vano; 
	var request = $.ajax({
	  url: "calendar/cal_mini.inc.php",
	  method: "GET",
	  data: { month : vmes, year : vano },
	  dataType: "html",
	  	  success: function(data){ 
	  				$('#calendario').html(data);
				}

	});
};	

</script>

		  <ul class="ui-tabs-nav">
          
          	        <li class="ui-tabs-nav-item" id="nav-fragment-1"><a href="#fragment-1"><img src="intranet/imgnews/627261dfbf.jpg" alt="" width="94" height="62"/></a></li>

        <h1 id="barrasp_logo"><a href="http://www.saopaulo.sp.gov.br/" target="_blank" title="Governo do estado de s&atilde;o paulo">Portal do Governo do Estado de S&atilde;o Paulo</a></h1>
    </div>
</div>

<script>
    function mostrarAviso(titulo, tipo, executar, descricao) {
        if (!$('#aviso').is(':visible')) {
            if (titulo)
                $("#avisoTitulo").html(titulo);
            if (descricao)
                $("#avisoDesc").html(descricao);
            if (tipo) {
                $('#avisoExecutar').attr('title', tipo);
            }
            if (tipo == 2 || tipo == 3) {
                if (executar) {
                    $('#avisoExecutar').val(executar);
                }
            }
            $("#aviso").fadeIn();
            alinharAlerta('#aviso');
        } else {
            $("#aviso").fadeOut(300, function() {
                $(".aviso-mensagem").css("width", "335px");
                $("#avisoDesc").html("");
            });
        }
    }
</script></div>
</section>

        <div class="rodape-itens">
            <div class="endereco">
                <h2>SP-PREVCOM</h2>
                <p>Fundação de Previdência Complementar do Estado de São Paulo</p>
                <div class="end-info">
                            <p>Avenida Brigadeiro Lu&#237;s Ant&#244;nio, 2701 Jardim Paulista</p>
                            <p>S&#227;o Paulo - SP</p>
                            <p>01401-000</p>
                    <a class="end-link cor-4" href="https://goo.gl/maps/FoUsj" target="_blank"><span class="icon-right-open-mini"></span>Ir para mapa</a>
                </div>
                <img class="end-mapa" src="/Content/Site/img/mapa.jpg" alt="Mapa" width="290" height="169">
            </div>

					<div class="item-page" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Article">
	<meta itemprop="inLanguage" content="en-GB" />
	
		
						
	
	
				
								<div itemprop="articleBody">
		<h2>Welcome to the Joomla! Trademark and Licensing website</h2>
<p><br /> The purpose of the trademark site is to help clarify the topic of Joomla!® trademark and how it pertains to your business or organisation. It will help you to know how and when you can or cannot use Joomla! in your business or organisation.</p>
<p>Joomla! the word is a registered trademark. The logo/icon/clover is trademarked. You must have permission and show the appropriate disclosures to use Joomla! and the logo.</p>
<p>The trademark sites goal is to help you understand and execute proper procedure and policies around using the Joomla! trademarked pieces. This site is categorised so that you can find the information you need to know in order to stay in trademark compliance and then do what you do best not worrying about trademark issues.</p>
<div class="row-fluid">
<div class="span4 well">
  <span class="icon-joomla" style="font-size: 75px;padding:35%;"></span>
  <h3 class="text-center">
    Trademark
  </h3>
  <hr /> 
  <p class="text-center">
    The Joomla!® name and logo are trademarks of Open Source Matters, Inc. in the United States and other countries. 
  </p>
  <hr />
  <p class="text-center">
    <a href="/trademark" title="Find out more about the Trademark" class="btn btn-primary btn-large">
      Find out more
    </a>
  </p>
</div>
<div class="span4 well">
  <span class="icon-key" style="font-size: 75px;padding:35%;"></span>
  <h3 class="text-center">
    License
  </h3>
   <hr />
  <p class="text-center">
    Joomla! is Free Software released under the GNU/GPL License. We encourage extension developers to use the same license.
  </p>
  <hr />
  <p class="text-center">
    <a href="/licensing" title="Get more info on Licensing" class="btn btn-primary btn-large">
      Get more info
    </a>
  </p>
</div>
<div class="span4 well">
  <span class="icon-comment" style="font-size: 75px;padding:35%;"></span>
  <h3 class="text-center">
    Contact
  </h3>
   <hr />
  <p class="text-center">
    Need more information? Do you need to request permission to use the Joomla! name or logo? Want to report a violation?
  </p>
  <hr />
  <p class="text-center">
    <a href="/contact" title="Trademark Contact Center" class="btn btn-primary btn-large">
      Submit a Ticket
    </a>
  </p>
</div>
</div> 	</div>

	
							</div>

jQuery(document).ready(function() {
	jQuery(document.body).SLScrollToTop({
		'image':		'/images/to_top.png',
		'text':			'',

		jQuery(document).ready(function (){
			jQuery('.advancedSelect').chosen({"disable_search_threshold":10,"search_contains":true,"allow_single_deselect":true,"placeholder_text_multiple":"Type or select some options","placeholder_text_single":"Select an option","no_results_text":"No results match"});
		});
	jQuery(function($){ $(".hasTooltip").tooltip({"html": true,"container": "body"}); });
jQuery(document).ready(function() {
	var value, searchword = jQuery('#mod-finder-searchword315');

		// Get the current value.
		value = searchword.val();

		// If the current value equals the default value, clear it.
		searchword.on('focus', function ()
		{
			var el = jQuery(this);

			if (el.val() === 'Search ...')
			{
				el.val('');
			}
		});

		// If the current value is empty, set the previous value.
		searchword.on('blur', function ()
		{
			var el = jQuery(this);

			if (!el.val())
			{
				el.val(value);
			}
		});

		jQuery('#mod-finder-searchform315').on('submit', function (e)
		{
			e.stopPropagation();
			var advanced = jQuery('#mod-finder-advanced315');

			// Disable select boxes with no value selected.
			if (advanced.length)
			{
				advanced.find('select').each(function (index, el)
				{
					var el = jQuery(el);

					if (!el.val())
					{
						el.attr('disabled', 'disabled');
					}
				});
			}
		});
	var suggest = jQuery('#mod-finder-searchword315').autocomplete({
		serviceUrl: '/component/finder/?task=suggestions.suggest&amp;format=json&amp;tmpl=component',
		paramName: 'q',
		minChars: 1,
		maxHeight: 400,
		width: 300,
		zIndex: 9999,
		deferRequestBy: 500
	});});

n.hasInsight?n.info:null};this.eventManager.add(WindowEvent.Load,window,this.recordPageLoad);u=this.addError;this.startAjaxCapture();window.opera?this.eventManager.add(WindowEvent.Error,document,s):"onerror"in window&&(f=window.onerror,window.onerror=function(n,t,i){return(u(n,t,i),!!f)?f(n,t,i):!1});!window.__cpCdnPath||(this.restUrl=window.__cpCdnPath.trim());t=document.createElement("iframe");i=t.style;i.position="absolute";i.top="-10000px";i.left="-1000px";e=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];e.parentNode.insertBefore(t,e);var o=t.contentWindow.document.open("text/html","replace"),h=window.location.protocol+"//",r='<body onload="';r+="function s(u){var d=document,s=d.createElement('script');s.type='text/javascript';s.src=u;d.body.appendChild(s);}";r+="s('"+h+this.restUrl+"');";r+='"><\/body>';o.write(r);o.close()}return n.prototype.isNullOrEmpty=function(n){if(n===undefined||n===null)return!0;if(typeof n=="string"){var t=n;return t.trim().length==0}return!1},n.prototype.dispatchCustomEvent=function(n){(function(n){function t(n,t){t=t||{bubbles:!1,cancelable:!1,detail:undefined};var i=document.createEvent("CustomEvent");return i.initCustomEvent(n,t.bubbles,t.cancelable,t.detail),i}if(typeof n.CustomEvent=="function")return!1;t.prototype=Event.prototype;n.CustomEvent=t})(window);var t=new CustomEvent(n);window.dispatchEvent(t)},n}(),profiler=new RProfiler;window.RProfiler=profiler;window.WindowEvent=WindowEvent;profiler.dispatchCustomEvent("GlimpseLoaded");
</script>

	<!--[if lt IE 9]><script src="/media/jui/js/html5.js"></script><![endif]-->

<div class="container">
<div class="custom hero-heading center">
<h2>The Free Software Powering Millions of Websites</h2>
<p>Joomla! is an award-winning content management system (CMS), which enables you to build web sites and powerful online applications.</p>
</div>
<div class="hero-teaser row-fluid center">
<div class="span4">
<article><header class="hidden-phone"><a href="https://downloads.joomla.org" title="Download Joomla!"><span class="icon-circled icon-circled-sm icon-shadowed"> <span class="icon-download svg-icon"></span></span></a>
<h3 class="hero-teaser-title">Download Joomla!</h3>
</header>
<div class="hero-teaser-body hidden-phone">
<p>Download and Install Joomla! in your own server or development environment.</p>
</div>
<footer><a href="https://downloads.joomla.org" title="Download Joomla!">Download Joomla! &rarr;</a></footer></article>
</div>
<div class="span4">

<h3 class="hero-teaser-title">Use Joomla!</h3>
</header>
<div class="hero-teaser-body hidden-phone">
<p>Quickly launch a basic version of Joomla! on joomla.com. Easily upgrade for additional features.</p>
</div>
<footer><a href="https://www.joomla.com" title="Free hosted Joomla! website">Launch Joomla! &rarr;</a></footer></article>
</div>
<div class="span4">

<h3 class="hero-teaser-title">Try Joomla!</h3>
</header>
<div class="hero-teaser-body hidden-phone">
<p>Experiment with a full 90 day demo version of Joomla. Great for testing an extension or template.</p>

<div class="custom whyjoomla"  >
	<div class="row-fluid customcontainer">
<div class="span6">
<h2>Why Joomla?</h2>
<p>Hundreds of developers have been improving Joomla! since the first version was released in 2005. This immense effort has made Joomla! very popular, easy to use, stable and secure.</p>
<p>Joomla! has thousands of free extensions and templates allowing you to customize your site to fit your specific needs.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a class="btn btn-danger btn-large" href="/3" title="Discover Joomla! 3.x">Learn more about Joomla! 3</a></p>
</div>
<div class="span6 video-container"><iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/j006Q7mDYIU?rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe></div>
</div></div>
		</div>

<div class="span7 events">
<div class="event">
<h2>Upcoming Events</h2>
<figure><img src="/images/homepage/joomla-events.jpg" alt="joomla events" /></figure>
<h3>JoomlaDay Netherlands 2017</h3>
<p>JoomlaDay Netherlands will take place from Friday, March 31st until Sunday, April 2nd in Zeist! It's the 12th edition of the Dutch JoomlaDay and we are working on an interesting program for Joomla! beginners and advanced users.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a class="btn btn-primary btn-large" title="Joomla! Events" href="https://community.joomla.org/events.html">More events</a></p>
</div>
<div class="contribute">
<div>
<h2>Joomla! Means Community</h2>
<p>Joomla! is the only major CMS that is built entirely by volunteers from all over the world. We have a strong community bond and all take pleasure in building something that has a large global impact. If you are interested in volunteering please head over to the volunteer portal.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a class="btn btn-danger btn-large" title="Contribute to Joomla!" href="https://volunteers.joomla.org">Get involved</a></p>
</div>
</div>

	<section class="section-4 numbers">
<div class="container-fluid">
<div class="row no-gutter">
<div class="span2 numbers-box installations">
<div class="numbers-text"><span class="number"><span class="count-up" data-from="0" data-to="80">80</span> <sup>+</sup></span><br />Million<br />Downloads</div>
</div>
<div class="span2 numbers-box installations hidden-phone">
<div class="numbers-img">
<div class="numbers-overlay">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
</div>

			<div class="moduletable who center">
						

<div class="custom who center"  >
	<h2>Who is using Joomla?</h2>
<p class="lead">Joomla! is trusted by some of the world&rsquo;s most well-known companies and much-loved brands as well as millions of websites throughout the world!</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var myArray = ['server a', 'server b', 'server c', 'server d'];
    var SrvNm = myArray[Math.floor(Math.random() * myArray.length)];
    var SrvMin = -20;
    var SrvMax = 1000;
    var SrvTm = Math.floor(Math.random() * (SrvMax - SrvMin + 1)) + SrvMin;
    var min = 0;
    var max = 90;
    var sales = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;
    var items=Math.floor(Math.random()*10)
    var myVar = ['varA', 'varB'];
    var glimpseVar = myVar[Math.floor(Math.random() * myArray.length)];
    RProfiler.addInfo('variation', glimpseVar);
    RProfiler.addInfo('conversion', sales, items);
    RProfiler.addInfo('indicator', 'srvrtime', SrvTm);
    RProfiler.addInfo('tracepoint', 'srvrname', SrvNm);
    RProfiler.addInfo('indicator', 'size', 2722);
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	function ab_search(ab_callback, args){
		var valid_tags = new Array()

		args.forEach(function(c, i, a) {
			if (c) {
				if (typeof(a[i]) ===  'string') valid_tags.push(c)
				else if (Object.prototype.toString.call(a[i]) === '[object Array]') {
					c.forEach(
						function(c, i, a){ if(typeof(c) === 'string') valid_tags.push(c)}
					);
				}
			}
		})

		if (valid_tags.length > 0) {
			return ab_callback(valid_tags)
		}
	}

	function ab_begin() {
		var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments)

		document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function(event) {
			var val = ab_search(function (valid_tags) {
				var ab_found = 'disabled',
				is_valid_el = function(tag) {
					if (tag !== null && tag !== undefined) ab_found = is_ab_found(tag)
				},
				is_ab_found = function(tag) {
					return (tag.clientHeight=== 0 || tag.clientHeight=== undefined || tag.clientWidth === 0 || tag.clientWidth === undefined)? 'enabled': ab_found;
				}

				valid_tags.forEach(function(c, i, a) {
					var tag = document.getElementsByClassName(c)
					is_valid_el(tag[0])
					tag = window.document.getElementById(c)
					is_valid_el(tag)
				});

				return ab_found;
			}, args)

			val = (val) ? val : 'undefined';
			RProfiler.addInfo('tracepoint', 'ab', val);
		});
	}

	//put IDs and/or classnames here
	ab_begin(['banner', 'custom'])
</script>

	  	March brings great and exciting news for the Joomla Community! The ballots are closed and we have the new Board of Directors.&nbsp;Also, we got the news that Joomla! has been selected for Google Summer of Code 2017!	  </div>

jQuery(document).ready(function() {
	jQuery(document.body).SLScrollToTop({
		'image':		'/images/to_top.png',
		'text':			'',
		'title':		'',
		'className':	'scrollToTop',
		'duration':		500

		jQuery(document).ready(function (){
			jQuery('.advancedSelect').chosen({"disable_search_threshold":10,"search_contains":true,"allow_single_deselect":true,"placeholder_text_multiple":"Type or select some options","placeholder_text_single":"Select an option","no_results_text":"No results match"});
		});
	jQuery(function($){ $(".hasTooltip").tooltip({"html": true,"container": "body"}); });
jQuery(document).ready(function() {
	var value, searchword = jQuery('#mod-finder-searchword315');

		// Get the current value.
		value = searchword.val();

		// If the current value equals the default value, clear it.
		searchword.on('focus', function ()
		{
			var el = jQuery(this);

			if (el.val() === 'Search ...')
			{
				el.val('');
			}
		});

		// If the current value is empty, set the previous value.
		searchword.on('blur', function ()
		{
			var el = jQuery(this);

			if (!el.val())
			{
				el.val(value);
			}
		});

		jQuery('#mod-finder-searchform315').on('submit', function (e)
		{
			e.stopPropagation();
			var advanced = jQuery('#mod-finder-advanced315');

			// Disable select boxes with no value selected.
			if (advanced.length)
			{
				advanced.find('select').each(function (index, el)
				{
					var el = jQuery(el);

					if (!el.val())
					{
						el.attr('disabled', 'disabled');
					}
				});
			}
		});
	var suggest = jQuery('#mod-finder-searchword315').autocomplete({
		serviceUrl: '/component/finder/?task=suggestions.suggest&amp;format=json&amp;tmpl=component',
		paramName: 'q',
		minChars: 1,
		maxHeight: 400,
		width: 300,
		zIndex: 9999,
		deferRequestBy: 500
	});});
	</script>
