    <div id="block-homepage-content" data-block-plugin-id="system_main_block">
  
    
      <article role="article" about="/node/1">

  
    

  
  <div>
    
      <div>
              <div>        
<div class="paragraph paragraph--type--paragraph-2-column paragraph--view-mode--default row">
    <div class="col-md-6 " >
        
            <div><h3>A global leader, a statewide partner</h3>

<p>With a record $336 million in external research funding in 2016, Oregon State researchers are leaders and innovators in natural resources, technology, agriculture, public health and other areas. The economic impact of Oregon States research enterprise: $762 million statewide and globally, according to ECONorthwest. Oregons leading public research university partners with communities and businesses across the state, the nation and the world to solve our most challenging problems.</p>

<ul><li><a href="http://research.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Research Office');">Research Office</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://terra.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Terra');">Terra</a>  Oregon States research magazine</li>
</ul></div>
      
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6 light_text" style=background-image:url(/sites/default/files/2017-02/AunaGodinez-min.jpg)>
        
            <div><div style="position:absolute;bottom:10px;left:10px;right:10px;background:rgba(255,255,255,.9);color:#373a3c;padding:10px;">
<h4>Learning beyond the classroom</h4>

<p><a style="color:#c34500;" href="http://poweredbyorange.com/2016/02/26/natural-beauty/">Auna Godinez</a> has explored her interest in renewable materials through <a style="color:#c34500;" href="http://undergraduate.oregonstate.edu/research/">undergraduate research</a>, <a style="color:#c34500;" href="http://international.oregonstate.edu/osugo/study-abroad-programs">study abroad</a> and field work in the forests of Peru.</p>


<p><a class="btn btn-primary" href="http://oregonstate.edu/admissions/main/apply-choose-application" style="text-decoration:none;">Apply Now</a></p>
</div>
</div>
      
    </div>
</div>
</div>
              <div>    
<div class="left-text paragraph paragraph--type--paragraph-1-column paragraph--view-mode--default row">
    <div class="col-md-12" style=background-image:url(/sites/default/files/paragraphs/courthouse-compressor_0.jpg)>
        
            <div><div style="background:rgba(0,0,0,.7);padding:20px;">
<h3>Oregons statewide university begins in Corvallis</h3>

<p>Oregon State Universitys hometown is consistently ranked among the best college towns in the nation  as well as one of the smartest, safest and most sustainable. <a href="http://oregonstate.edu/admissions/static/corvallis/#.Va2SRcZVhkI">Learn all the reasons</a> why Corvallis is a great place to live and learn.</p>

<p>And Corvallis is just a starting point. Oregon State brings leadership, innovation and excellence to every corner of Oregon. That includes education, pharmacy, veterinary medicine and professional MBA programs in Portland, world-class marine science programs in Newport and <a href="http://osucascades.edu/">OSU-Cascades</a>, its four-year campus in Bend.</p>

<ul><li><a href="http://portland.oregonstate.edu/">PORTLAND</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://osucascades.edu/">BEND</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://hmsc.oregonstate.edu/">NEWPORT</a></li>
</ul></div>
</div>
      
    </div>
</div>
</div>
              <div>        
<div class="left-text black_bg_right bg_padding light_text paragraph paragraph--type--paragraph-2-column paragraph--view-mode--default row">
    <div class="col-md-6 light_text" style=background-image:url(/sites/default/files/2016-08/marine-compressor-compressor.jpg)>
        
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6 " >
        
            <div><h3>Saving the oceans, saving the world</h3>

<p>The <a href="http://marinestudies.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Marine Studies');">Marine Studies Initiative</a> is a university-wide commitment and a new model for teaching, research and outreach to address emerging issues and challenges facing the worlds oceans. It builds on Oregon States deep history of nationally ranked programs, world-leading research and premier facilities to help sustain healthy oceans and ensure wellness, environmental health and economic prosperity for future generations.</p>

<p><a class="btn btn-primary" href="https://youtu.be/6DD6lID4R8A" style="text-decoration:none;">Watch Video</a></p>
</div>
      
    </div>
</div>
</div>
              <div>
<div class="force-dark left-text paragraph paragraph--type--paragraph-2-column paragraph--view-mode--default row">
    <div class="col-md-6 " >
        
            <div><h3>A 21st century land grant for Oregon, the nation and the world</h3>

<p>Designated the states land grant institution in 1868, Oregon State University continues to fulfill its mission of accessible education, problem-solving research and outreach that serves communities statewide. Oregon is our natural laboratory, and with a presence in all 36 counties  from coast to valley, mountains to high desert, cities to farms and ranches  our impact reaches across Oregon and beyond.</p>
</div>
      
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6 " >
        
            <div><ul><li><a href="http://extension.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Extension');">Extension Service</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://pace.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'PACE');">Professional and Continuing Education</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://summer.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Summer Session');">Summer Session</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://ecampus.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Ecampus');">Ecampus</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://oregonprogress.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Ag Progress');">Oregon's Agricultural Progress</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://fic.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Food Innovation Center');">Food Innovation Center</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://osuseafoodlab.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Seafood Lab');">Seafood Research and Extension Center</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://hmsc.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Hatfield');">Hatfield Marine Science Center</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://seagrant.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Sea Grant');">Sea Grant</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://spacegrant.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Space Grant');">Space Grant</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://sungrant.oregonstate.edu/" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'viewbook', 'Sun Grant');">Sun Grant</a></li>
</ul></div>
      
    </div>
</div>
</div>
          </div>
  
  </div>

</article>

  </div>
